title: Waveframe v4.0 — AI-Orchestrated Proof of Concept in Cosmology
description: Waveframe v4.0 is a proof-of-concept cosmological framework built via a multi-threaded, AI-assisted research workflow with continuous human validation. It explores an entropy–action, observer-driven expansion law (H(t) ∝ 1/√(t − t₀), S(t) = π / H(t)²) and compares it to ΛCDM using locally run Python numerics. This release is intended for portfolio demonstration of AI Workflow Designer skills, parallel prompt orchestration, and reproducible independent research.
